Title: Relates to requiring reporting and verification of greenhouse gas emissions by certain entities
Summary: Requires reporting and verification of scope 1, 2 and 3 greenhouse gas emissions by a business with total annual revenues in excess of one billion dollars ($1,000,000,000) that does business in New York; requires regulations and disclosures.

ActClause: AN ACT to amend the environmental conservation law, in relation to requiring reporting and verification of greenhouse gas emissions by certain entities
